search_ch0130_10_serena/4001_1001_0100_1:
We found another one of these sparkly
green things...
search_ch0130_10_serena/4001_1001_0200_1: No doubt about it. This must be—
search_ch0130_10_serena/4001_1001_0300_1: Whoa... Is that what I think it is?
search_ch0130_10_serena/4001_1001_0500_1: Doesn’t look like it wants to attack us.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4001_1001_0700_1:
It’s not aggressive... And the fact that it’s not
leaving your side must mean it wants to
follow you.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4001_1001_0800_1: Why don’t we head back into town for now?
search_ch0130_10_serena/4001_1001_1000_1:
First, Xerneas and Yveltal showed up on Pasio,
and now Zygarde’s here.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4001_1001_1100_1:
That makes the third Legendary Pokémon
from Kalos...
search_ch0130_10_serena/4002_1001_0100_1:
A few days later, Professor Sycamore called
Serena, Calem, and [Name:PlayerNickname ]
together to meet up with him again.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4002_1001_0200_1: Did I keep you two waiting?
search_ch0130_10_serena/4002_1001_0300_1:
Sorry I’m late. I was walking here with Zygarde,
but it kept getting distracted.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4002_1001_0400_1:
I don’t think I’ve seen you wear that outfit
before, Serena. Is it new?
search_ch0130_10_serena/4002_1001_0500_1:
Yeah! I thought I’d change things up since I’m
hanging out with Zygarde!
search_ch0130_10_serena/4002_1001_0600_1:
I even did my hair a little different, to look more
grown-up!
search_ch0130_10_serena/4002_1001_0700_1:
It looks really cool on you. And I think it all comes
together really well!
search_ch0130_10_serena/4002_1001_0900_1: All right! Shall we go meet up with the professor?
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_0200_1:
There are a few new things I’ve learned about
Zygarde that I’d like to share with you.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_0300_1:
Those sparkly green things we were looking for
are actually cells. They come together to form
Zygarde’s body.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_0500_1:
Depending on the number of cells it has
collected within its body, it can transform into
different forms.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_0600_1:
So if we’re able to collect more of its cells than
it has now, that should theoretically give Zygarde
an immense amount of power!
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_0700_1:
I’m talking even more power than Xerneas
and Yveltal!
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_0800_1: Seriously? Even more power than those two?
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_0900_1:
According to legend, Zygarde monitors the
ecosystem, neutralizing those who harm it.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_1000_1:
I suspect that’s why it needs so much power—so
it can ward off those threats.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_1100_1:
Oh. But if its cells are scattered right now, that
means its power is incomplete, right?
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_1200_1:
Not exactly. In a pinch, it’s able to gather its cells
together if it needs to.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_1300_1:
There must be a reason why it scattered its
cells all over Pasio, then.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_1400_1:
If that’s the case, I can help find all of Zygarde’s
cells, Professor!
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_1500_1:
Maybe it’s sick and can’t call its cells together
or something...
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_1600_1:
If that’s why Zygarde’s sticking with me, then I
can’t just ignore it!
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_1700_1:
Hm... Like I said earlier, Zygarde is a Pokémon
that has great power hidden within itself.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_1800_1:
I’m not sure what would happen if it did collect
all of its cells together in one place...
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_1900_1:
Please, Professor? If anything happens, I promise
I’ll calm it down!
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_2000_1:
We’ll help her out, too, Professor. It’ll be safer
with three of us around, right?
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_2200_1: All right. I can see how determined you are.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_2300_1:
I’ll leave figuring out what Zygarde wants to do
to you three.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_2400_1:
As for me, I’ll stay here and try to find as much
info as I can!
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_2600_1:
I’ll ask some Champion-class Trainers for their
help, too, just in case something does happen.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_2700_1:
But I believe in you three! Just be sure to stay
safe, all right?
search_ch0130_10_serena/4003_1001_2900_1:
OK! Let’s head out and find the rest of
Zygarde’s cells!
search_ch0130_10_serena/4004_1001_0100_1:
Ah, hello there. I heard about you from
Professor Kukui.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4004_1001_0200_1:
I hear you’ve been struggling with something
related to Zygarde?
search_ch0130_10_serena/4004_1001_0300_1:
It’s a Pokémon chock-full of mysteries to solve,
after all. That’s what makes it such an
interesting specimen!
search_ch0130_10_serena/4004_1001_0400_1:
If you’re struggling to collect the cells, I can
teach you a shortcut.
search_ch0130_10_serena/4005_1001_0100_1: Look at all the cells around here!
search_ch0130_10_serena/4006_1001_0200_1:
We just gathered them up like usual, though...
What was that shortcut you were talking about?
search_ch0130_10_serena/4006_1001_0300_1:
Oh, of course. I can show you a much faster way
to find these cells than going around
collecting them...
search_ch0130_10_serena/4006_1001_0600_1: What do you think you’re doing?!
search_ch0130_10_serena/4006_1001_0700_1:
Hehehe! When Zygarde’s strength is compromised,
it has the ability to call its cells to come together!
search_ch0130_10_serena/4006_1001_0800_1:
So there’s really no reason for you to waste time
walking around searching for them!
